faq.label: FAQ
faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about ModGuard.
faq.q1: How does the role protection system work?
faq.a1: It monitors sensitive role changes and enforces protection rules to prevent unauthorized edits.
faq.a2: Yes—create custom commands/shortcuts and bind them to granular permissions.
faq.q3: What types of attacks can the system prevent?
faq.a3: It prevents common raid patterns, suspicious joins, role abuse, and permission escalations.
faq.q4: How does the anti-fake system work?
faq.a4: It detects impersonation patterns and blocks suspicious activity before it spreads.
faq.q5: Can I migrate from another moderation bot?
faq.a5: Yes—our team can help migrate settings and workflows depending on your setup.
